mapper.update:
update skill_item
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
skill_describe = #{skillDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
price_step = #{priceStep,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
skill_status = #{skillStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update skill_item set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill_describe = #{skillDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, price_step = #{priceStep,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, skill_status = #{skillStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
